SetupReport.EmbedMainDescription:
This module will allow server members to report suspicious messages to the moderation team for analysis in a simple and quick way.
If everything is configured correctly, a message will be sent in the channel chosen below and the moderator will be able to take whatever actions he deems appropriate.

**How to configure?**
1. Create a Text Channel **private**.
`Reports made by server members will be posted on this channel.`
`Only allow your team of moderators to access the channel.`
`Recommended to activate age restrictions on the channel (NSFW).`
2. Select the channel created in the selector below.
3. Activate the module.

**How to report?**
1. On a computer, right-click on a message, on a cell phone, tap and hold on a message.
2. Go to option **Apps** and select **Report Message**.

SetupMJoinLeave.EmbedMainDescription: Alfredo will send a message when a member joins or leaves the server.

`{guild}` - Server name
`{guild.members}` - Number of members on the server

SetupTempVoice.LockUnLockDesc: - **Lock**: Prevents regular members from entering your channel.
SetupTempVoice.HiddenShowDesc: - **Hide**: Hides your channel from regular members.
SetupTempVoice.LimitDesc: - **Limit**: Limits the number of members in the call.
SetupTempVoice.DisconnectDesc: - **Disconnect**: Removes a user from the call.
SetupTempVoice.TrustDesc: - **Whitelist**: Allows the member to see/enter your channel when it is hidden/locked.
SetupTempVoice.BlockDesc: - **Block**: Prevents the member from connecting to the call or seeing the text chat.
SetupTempVoice.ClaimChannelDesc: - **Claim**: Obtains channel ownership if the owner is not connected.
SetupTempVoice.TransferOwnerDesc: - **Transfer**: Transfers channel ownership to another connected member.
SetupTempVoice.UseVADDesc: - **Use Voice Activity**: When disabled, Push-to-Talk will be required.

TempVoice.LockUnLockHiddenShowDesc:
**Lock** your channel, prevents members without pass from connecting or reading text chat, but they can see it in the channel list.
**Hide**, prevents members without pass from seeing or entering the channel.
TempVoice.LimitDisconnectDesc:
**Limits** the number of members that can connect to the voice channel.
**Disconnect** will remove a user from the voice channel.
TempVoice.UseSoundboardUseVADDesc:
Enables/disables the **sound effects** panel.
When **Voice Activity** is disabled, "Push to Talk" will be mandatory.
TempVoice.TrustUnTrustDesc:
Allow the member to see/enter your channel when it is hidden/blocked.
-# Pass removes the member's block.
TempVoice.BlockUnBlockDesc:
Blocked members will not be able to see your channel, enter it or interact in the text channel.
-# Blocking removes the member's pass.
TempVoice.ClaimTransferOwnerDesc: Claim the channel if the owner leaves or transfer the channel to another connected member before you leave.
TempVoice.DeleteDesc: Disconnects everyone and deletes your channel.
TempVoice.UnBlockListEmpty: No members blocked on your channel.
TempVoice.UnTrustListEmpty: No members with pass on your channel.

CalcPB.InfoKD:
### This calculator allows you to visualize how much you need to kill without dying to increase your KD.
KD is an indication of how many enemies the player killed in relation to the number of times he died in the game.
Having a high KD means that the player killed much more than he died, for example KD 50% means that the player killed the same amount as he died.
CalcPB.InfoHS: ### :warning: Banned accounts may have an incorrect calculation result, as the headshot is not reset like K/D.
